entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 3.
